fajr_desc_3: Performing prayer before sunrise is recommended
shorouq_desc_2: End of Fajr time and start of the day
night_desc_2: Tahajjud is the best night prayer
intro_desc_1: Your journey organized by prayer times, highlighting the most relevant Azkar for your current moment.
intro_desc_2: Every Zekr is backed by authentic Hadiths. The Prophet ﷺ said: “Shall I not tell you the best of your deeds, the purest with your King, the highest in your ranks, better for you than spending gold and silver, and better for you than meeting your enemy and striking their necks or being struck? They said: Yes, O Messenger of Allah. He said: Remembering Allah.” Know the exact merit and reward for every word you say.
intro_desc_4: Track your consistency with a beautiful calendar view. See your progress and build your daily spiritual habits.
intro_desc_3: Turn every moment into worship. Let's start building your legacy of remembrance today.
app_idea_video_title: The app idea is inspired by the following video
location_message: We need access to your location to determine prayer times accurately.
delete_zikr_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Zikr?
rate_the_app_subtitle: Rate the app to help us improve
rate_app_message: We'd love to hear your feedback! Your review helps us improve.
showcase_history_desc: View your Zikr history and progress over time.
showcase_settings_desc: Customize app theme, language, and notifications.
showcase_reminders_desc: Manage your scheduled Zikr notifications here.
showcase_theme_desc: Switch between Light and Dark modes.
showcase_language_desc: Change the app language to Arabic or English.
showcase_location_desc: Update your location to get accurate prayer times.
showcase_play_ayah_desc: Play the ayah with your favorite reciter in startup.
showcase_reward_desc: Each card displays a reward with a completion checkbox. Tap the card to view the full Hadith and set up daily reminders
showcase_calendar_desc: View all your completed zekr on the calendar. Each day shows which zekr you've done
showcase_appointment_desc: Tap to see how many times you've completed this zekr. Long press to delete an entry
sadkah_desc: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: "Whoever guides someone to goodness will have a reward like the one who does it."
dua_support_desc: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: "The supplication of a Muslim for his brother in his absence is answered. At his head is an appointed angel; whenever he supplicates for his brother, the angel says: Ameen, and for you the same."
A reminder for this reward already exist: A reminder for this reward already exists. Do you want to replace it?
